greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of noncrossing path sets on n nodes up to rotation with each path having a prime number of nodes.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
program: (PARI) \\ number of path sets with restricted path lengths
1 + Q/2 + intformal((p - 1 + sum(d=2, n, eulerphi(d)*substvec(q + O(x^(n\d+1)), vars, apply(t->t^d, vars))))/x)
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Apr 29 2018
